GeneralInfo.Name: Tv Movie EPG Import++
GeneralInfo.Author: rtv, Scrounger
GeneralInfo.ExtensionDescription:
TV Movie EPG Import++ plugin is a replacement for the Tv Movie EPG Import Plugin (Author: rtv) that comes as part of MediaPortal TvServer. The plugin use the Tv Movie Clickfinder Database to supplying you with EPG data for german TV channels. The Clickfinder Plugin maps this data to your MediaPortal TV channels.
Compared to the original Tv Movie EPG Import plugin, it offers a lot of additional import features.
New Features (Optional): - Easy enabling EPG grabbing for not mapped channels Calcualte rating from Tv Movie Clickfinder Database and import it into your EPG - Run an application after the import (e.g. Episodenscanner) - Import ratings, season- and episodenumbers form your MP-TvSeries into your EPG - Mark not existing episodes as “Neue Folge:” in EPG describtion (only works if you have enable the download for the whole Series (MP-TvSeries Wiki) in the MP-TvSeries Plugin Configuration Plugin Configuration - Imports ratings from your MovingPictures and Video databases and mark existing Movie as „Lokal verfügbar“ in EPG Describtion. An integration of MyFilms database will be supported in a feature version. - Imports addiotional Data that are needed for the MediaPortal Plugin Clickfinder ProgramGuide
GeneralInfo.VersionDescription:
Version 1.1.0.0
- stable Version - own LOG-File - tvmovie++.log

SectionParam.Name: Online Icon
SectionParam.Description: The icon file of the package stored online (jpg,png,bmp)

SectionParam.Name: Configuration file
SectionParam.Description: The file used to configure the extension. If have .exe extension the will be executed If have .dll extension used like MP plugin configuration

SectionParam.Name: Online Screenshots
SectionParam.Description: Online stored screenshot urls separated by ;

SectionParam.Name: Force to uninstall on update
SectionParam.Description: Show dialog and force to uninstall previous version when updating an extension. Should only be disabled if you are using an NSIS/MSI installer.

GeneralInfo.Name: Tv Movie EPG Import++
GeneralInfo.Author: rtv, Scrounger
GeneralInfo.ExtensionDescription:
TV Movie EPG Import++ plugin is a replacement for the Tv Movie EPG Import Plugin (Author: rtv) that comes as part of MediaPortal TvServer. The plugin use the Tv Movie Clickfinder Database to supplying you with EPG data for german TV channels. The Clickfinder Plugin maps this data to your MediaPortal TV channels.
Compared to the original Tv Movie EPG Import plugin, it offers a lot of additional import features.
New Features (Optional): - Easy enabling EPG grabbing for not mapped channels Calcualte rating from Tv Movie Clickfinder Database and import it into your EPG - Run an application after the import (e.g. Episodenscanner) - Import ratings, season- and episodenumbers form your MP-TvSeries into your EPG - Mark not existing episodes as “Neue Folge:” in EPG describtion (only works if you have enable the download for the whole Series (MP-TvSeries Wiki) in the MP-TvSeries Plugin Configuration Plugin Configuration - Imports ratings from your MovingPictures and Video databases and mark existing Movie as „Lokal verfügbar“ in EPG Describtion. An integration of MyFilms database will be supported in a feature version. - Imports addiotional Data that are needed for the MediaPortal Plugin Clickfinder ProgramGuide
GeneralInfo.VersionDescription: Version 1.1.3.0 - "Enable EPG grabbing for not mapped channels" shows now only channels that are mapped in group - Import Rating from MovingPictures / VideoDatabase bug fixed - Identify MovingPictures movies also by alternate title and filename - Identify VideoDatabase movies also by filename

The plugin use the Tv Movie Clickfinder Database to supplying you with EPG data for german TV channels. The Clickfinder Plugin maps this data to your MediaPortal TV channels. GeneralInfo.VersionDescription: Version 1.1.6.0 - import accuracy improved - small bug fixes - New Import Feature: If you use the Episodenscanner, the plugin now imports also the Series found by Episodenscanner, including mark as "Neue Folge" in EPG describtion. [Optional]

GeneralInfo.VersionDescription: Version 1.2.0.0 - TvSeries import accuracy bug fixed - mark Series found by episodenscanner as "neue Folge", if not exist in TvSeries database - Found Series by Season- & Episodenumber bug fixed - small bug fixes
GeneralInfo.Location: D:\Projekte\Tv Movie EPG Import++\MPE1\Tv Movie EPG Import++.mpe1
